name: le parcours (parkour)
description:
CONTROLS:
1 run
2 jump/grab edges
3 tuck
4 end grab and get up
5 gainer backflip
R restart

when holding on to a bar
1 swing
2 release from bar
3 tuck

RECOMMEND LISTENING TO UR FAV MUSIC WHILE PLAYING FOR BEST EXPERIENCE *o*

run and flip off buildings
parkour / free running
